H3.text: who sings the christmas song mary did you know. Michael English

A4.text: It was originally recorded by Christian recording artist Michael English on his self-titled debut solo album in 1991.

A5.text: CeeLo Green (2012) 'Mary, Did You Know?' It was released as the first single from the album on August 21, 2020.

A6.text: The group's cover of 'Mary, Did You Know?' both debuted and peaked on the Billboard Hot 100 chart at number 26.

A7.text: Michael English (American singer) (born 1963), American Christian singer from North Carolina
